Package com.erliapp.utilities.database

Class DatabaseBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.erliapp.utilities.database.DatabaseBuilder
public class DatabaseBuilder extends Object
Database Builder. A Utility to create a Database with proper formatting. Makes it easier, so you don't need specific configuration!

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseBuilder

      public DatabaseBuilder()
      Default Constructor. Runs main constructor, and initialises Properties as default.

    • DatabaseBuilder

      public DatabaseBuilder(PropertiesEx properties)
      Primary Constructor. Sets up data, with a pre-set Properties.
      Parameters:
      properties - Configuration for Database (with or without data.)

  • Method Details

    • addDatabaseValue

      public void addDatabaseValue(String table, String key, String dataType) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a possible Row and column to a table in a database.
      Parameters:
      table - Table within database to use.
      key - Name of column.
      dataType - Data Type. Can either be text or bigint.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters are either null or an empty String.

    • setType

      public void setType(String type) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets a Database's Type.
      Parameters:
      type - Database Type. Can be either sqlite or cassandra.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if Database Type is not supported by the builder.

    • setContact

      public void setContact(String contact)
      Sets the Contact for a remote Database.
      Parameters:
      contact - Contact for Database.

    • setDatacenter

      public void setDatacenter(String datacenter)
      Sets the Datacenter for a Cassandra Database.
      Parameters:
      datacenter - Cassandra Datacenter.

    • setKeyspace

      public void setKeyspace(String keyspace)
      Sets the name of the Database. Keyspace for Cassandra, File name for Sqlite.
      Parameters:
      keyspace - Keyspace to set

    • setPort

      public void setPort(int port)
      Sets the official port for a database.
      Parameters:
      port - The port the database is hosted on.

    • setUser

      public void setUser(String username)
      Sets a Username to use Credentials to log in.
      Parameters:
      username - Username for Database.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)
      Sets a Password to log in with.
      Parameters:
      password - User Password.

    • setUseAuth

      public void setUseAuth(boolean useAuth)
      Sets whether Authentication is necessary for a database.
      Parameters:
      useAuth - true if auth is used. false if it isn't.

    • build

      public Database build() throws IllegalStateException, UnknownHostException
      Takes a Database Configuration, and builds a new Database.
      Returns:
      A new Database
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if any configuration is invalid for usage.
      UnknownHostException - if the database can't connect to Cassandra.
